title: Escape to God: How Our Family Left the Rat Race Behind to Search for Genuine Spirituality and the Simple Life
description: The pursuit of the "American Dream" robbed them of an authentic walk with God. So the Hohnbergers left the rat race behind to search for genuine spirituality and a simple life. Learn how to live every moment to the glory of God and listen to His still, small voice whispering to you throughout your day. You'll discover that true Christianity goes beyond intellectual assent and deals with your day-to-day choices.
author: Jim Hohnberger
